original_title: Cracking The Prophetic Code - Prophecy Revealed
overview: You will be shocked, and spellbound by this video, in which Ken Klein takes you through the panorama of human history, explaining historic events in their prophetic context, and bringing you to the doorstep of today. You will understand your world like never before, and the exciting dangerous moment in which we live, as Cracking the Prophetic Code puts all the pieces together with crystal clarity.
title: Cracking The Prophetic Code - Prophecy Revealed
